summary.description:
Evaluating fMRI-Based Estimation of Eye Gaze During Naturalistic Viewing.

Predictive Eye Estimation Regression.

Son, J., Ai, L., Lim, R., Xu, T., Colcombe, S., Franco, A., Cloud, J., LaConte, S., Lisinski, J., Klein, A., Craddock, C., Milham, M. (2018). Evaluating fMRI-Based Estimation of Eye Gaze during Naturalistic Viewing. bioRxiv. https://doi.org/10.1101/347765.
